mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeNo, memberNo, nocaNo, noticeSubject, noticeContent, noticeCreated, imageFilename) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, member_seq.NEXTVAL, notice_catagory_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, #{imageFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeNo, m.memberNo, nocaNo, noticeSubject, noticeContent, noticeCreated, imageFilename, memberNickname FROM notice n JOIN member_detail m ON m.memberNo = n.memberNo WHERE noticeNo = #{noticeNo}
SELECT noticeNo, m.memberNo, nocaNo, noticeSubject, noticeContent, noticeCreated, imageFilename, memberNickname FROM notice n JOIN member_detail m ON m.memberNo = n.memberNo
